full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Steel Armour Plates
### W2037-240023

#### Notice Number: WS4095531808

#### Tender Closing Date: 2023-08-29T14:00:00
*Note: The tender response deadline has been updated to 14:00 EDT on August 29, 2023, as per amendment WS4095531808-Doc4121746469.*

#### Request for Proposal
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is seeking proposals from qualified contractors to supply and deliver Steel Armour Plates.

#### Mandatory Technical Criteria
Offerors are required to demonstrate compliance with the mandatory technical criteria, outlined in the solicitation document. Failure to meet these criteria will result in the exclusion of the offer from further consideration.

#### Business Opportunities
This tender notice is open to all qualified contractors who meet the eligibility criteria specified in the solicitation document.

#### Evaluation Criteria
Offers will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Lowest Price

#### Notice of Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

#### Contact Information
Christopher Casale, PSPC/SPAC, can be reached at:

* Email: [christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 343-575-5249

#### Additional Information
The solicitation document and notice URL can be found at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17012675?extsite=MTcwMTI2NzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com
